name: Active Interview
overview:
Active Interview is a video interviewing & candidate screening web-application.

The product allows users to create custom questionnaires and then invite candidates to participate in a video enabled screening process. Using nothing more than a browser and a web-cam, candidates answer interview questions online and the videos are then available for scoring by hiring managers.

Active interview is web-based, and new users can sign up without going through an enterprise sales process, and be up and running immediately.

The target market includes organizations like universities, corporations, and small businesses who want to improve their hiring process by efficiently screening candidates, saving on travel expense, and gaining a better insight on candidates than a resumÃ© provides.

With web cams become a more prevalent commodity, and as an entirely new generation of workers grow up with web video technology, video-enhanced recruiting is likely to become more common in the hiring & admissions process.
